website_summaries.verdict: Though there have been some reported quality concerns, the upside is the exceptional guarantee from the company if you aren't satisfied.
pros: Therapeutic-grade quality pure tea tree oil in a protective green glass bottle with dropper
Not only is it guaranteed to be undiluted, it comes with an industry-leading lifetime guarantee
cons: Some bottles have a very strong scent, and some have oil that seems too thin or "watery."
May require mixing to lessen the strength

customer_reviews.title: BURNS SKIN OFF!  NOT REAL TEA TREE OIL! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had real tea tree oil before on my ears, but THIS IS NOT real tea tree oil. This BURNED THE LIVING HELL out of my ear by burning my skin OFF. I put it on a small keloid on my ear to help shrink it, but all it’s done is make it WORSE. Now I have to go see a dermatologist. On top of that, this stuff smells like gasoline! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Jackson

customer_reviews.title: NOT TEA TREE OIL ANYMORE - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. I bought this product before, and it was definitely tea tree oil. It smelled as it should and worked as it should. I ran out and bought some more from the exact same Amazon product page and they sent me... something else in the bottle. It smells TERRIBLE, and I don't know what it is. Another reviewer said turpentine, and that sounds like what I'm smelling... It reminded me of burnt rubber mixed with chemicals or formaldehyde or something, just disgusting to breathe. I'm sad this company went this route instead of increasing their price if they couldn't afford to offer 100% pure tea tree oil anymore for such a low cost. It's just wrong and unethical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this, the bottle leaked all over my other Amazon purchases in the box. Everything was contaminated and smelled like Tea Tree oil. Even though the seal was still intact, there was only half the bottle left. It’s also greasy and regular Tea Tree oils are more astringent in consistency.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Smells like gasoline
customer_reviews.text: Oil smelt like gasoline. Returning. I'm with all the negative comments, it's hard to believe anyone who has ever used tea tree oil to think this is tea tree oil. The smell alone is a dead give away that it's NOT tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: j.j

customer_reviews.title: The Real Stuff at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I first experimented with pure tea tree oil back in the late 1980s, testing it in the laboratory to verify claims of antifungal and antibacterial properties. I was a bit worried that green coloring had been added (pure tea tree oil is clear to yellowish in color), but it seems just the bottle itself is colored.This stuff seems to be the real deal---same color, aroma and consistency---and very reasonably priced. Note also that tea tree oil dissolves plastic gradually, so the underside of the cap was partially digested, though none had leaked into the package. Perhaps explains why so many customers have received leaky bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Shanghai Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great pure Tea Tree Oil!!! Ignore guy who put directly on his ear without diluting.
customer_reviews.text: Great Oil!!! Do not put this directly on skin. It even says this on the bottle clearly, as it will burn skin. The guy that put this directly on his ear should have read the bottle and directions. Use the tea tree oil with a few precautions: You should not apply tea tree oil directly to skin. It's important to dilute the oil with a carrier oil, such as olive oil, coconut oil, or almond oil. For every 1 to 2 drops of tea tree oil, add 12 drops of a carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: Just Cass

customer_reviews.title: It works on mold!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but 20 drops of this in hot water sprayed on black mold on my tile in the shower worked. The stubborn spots of mold we tried to remove with everything before are fading away after one spray. I will spray again and think it will take all the mold away. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stickley

customer_reviews.title: It does smell bad though. Use it outside
customer_reviews.text: Gave to a friend for athletes foot. The put it on a few time and let their feet dry completely. It removed his problem. He kept getting creams and junk from doctor. But this cured it. Works wonders. It does smell bad though. Use it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepen

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. Using it with carrier oil on my face. I've been using 4 days now and see improvement in diminished blemishes and redness. As for smell...it's tea tree oil, what were some other buyers expecting it to smell like, a bakery?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very potent for "100% pure" tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.text: Every other bottle of tea tree oil that I've ever bought has been so strong smelling that you can't stand to smell directly from the bottle. This tea tree oil barely has an odor. I'm pretty sure it is diluted.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Koolaid

customer_reviews.title: Fake or compromised tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tea tree oil. Because of the some bad reviews, I tested a small patch on the back of my hand. I have never had a negative reaction to tea tree oil, but this one made me break out in hives for a week. I didn’t find it overly oily or astringent, like some reviews mentioned, and it did smell like tea tree oil. But it must have something else in it, given that I’ve been using various brands of tea tree oil for nearly 10 years and have never reacted to it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree oil for healing and maybe getting rid of a dog's skin tag.
customer_reviews.text: Can't address "pain relief," really, since that's not why I purchased this Tea Tree oil. I got it to slather on my dog's skin tag. (Skin tag: small, benign skin growth.) I hope it does the trick. The oil is supposed to make the skin tag wither and go away. We tied off the bottom of the tag with dental floss, too. Fingers crossed. Scent is not overwhelming, but, then again, I love the smell of eucalyptus. There is a sensitive spot on the top corner of my forehead. I tried putting on some oil these past few days and the spot feels better already. Hooray for Tea Tree oils healing properties.
customer_reviews.author: @your6Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smell changes after awhile
customer_reviews.text: TRA tree oil has many uses. Call me crazy, but I was told to put on some before heading out the door these days to prevent COVID. There’s definitely no scientific evidence for it, but I am doing it anyways. The down side is this does not smell that nice. It has the expected fee free smell initially, but after a while it does not smell good, like some cloth was wet then dried.... happened many times and I thought it was my laundry didn’t dry well and then I finally realize it’s this tee tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Chuang

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. The last two orders of Tea Tree and other oils by Artizen have been poorer. I am not certain the quality in the bottle is less although the taste is different. The packaging has been down graded. There is no longer a dropper supplied with the order, and it is in a plastic bottle now instead of glass. Glass is the preferred way to ensure quality of oils. I will be looking for other suppliers for oils from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon L. Kury

customer_reviews.title: Fake Tea Tree
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Tea Tree because I trust Amazon. And I also trust your integrity for selling your product on Amazon. It’s a shame to sell a fake Tea Tree during the pandemic lockdown. The trust you destroyed will never be rebuilt. Please be aware of this product, the package looks beautiful. When I opened the Tea Tree, it smelled like gas, or garbage and I threw it away immediately. The awful smell stayed in my garage and laundry room for more than two weeks. I regret spraying the product in my car, it damaged the surface. I tired to clean the car, but it is now permanently marked on my car and I can never remove it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Use with a base like coconut oil and it won't burn you.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my second bottle in May. I'm buying my 3rd today. This is real tea tree oil. I see people talking about it burned them. Ummmm you're are not supposed to put it directly on your skin without a base like coconut oil. It helps with skin infections, acne and pain. I always mix it with coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Dermatitis and eczema stopped itching in one use💆🏾
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from really,REALLY bad dermatitis and eczema. On my face, scalp, and body. I put a dripper full in my hair and body lotion(as using a carrier oil is a necessity with such pure oil). I noticed my itching and scaling have already showing signs of clearing when it usually takes at least week+ previously(added sulf soap to my procces.) The owner even checked after shipping to see if i received everything as expected. Great product great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tynicka Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Company learned from previous customer reviews. RESPECT.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the real deal. Watery, which is a great sign. No color. Dropper came intact and wrapped in bubble wrap and there was no leakage of product whatsoever, which were 2 very big fears based on previous reviews. I have an unboxing video on this product in the video section. Happy this company learned from their mistakes. That's awesome! Everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lennon

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT COME WITH A DROPPER!
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it shows that this comes with a dropper - well guess what? Mine came with the bulb of the dropper but no actual tube that would go into the bottle. So literally every time I try to pour some oil out, I end up spilling a third of the oil because tea tree oil? Super runny. So I’m getting maybe half of the actual volume that I bought. As for the use, I usually liketo yse it on my dark spots- unfortunately I couldn’t tell you if it works because I literally dread opening this bottle and spilling the oil everywhere! So I have barely used it 😭
customer_reviews.author: Adrita Iman

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil!! Excellent scent, amazing on the skin, and works great in my diffuser. I am reordering this ASAP. I use this regularly in my office diffuser. Not an overpowering scent. Works great on the skin; not super oily. So many uses for Tee Tree that it is impossible to list here. I recommend. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: That Girlie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for piercings!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trague piercing I got in October that was tender and swollen. Was recommended by my piercer to get this to prevent a keloid from forming. I originally purchased another bottle, that was smaller than this one and did not have a dropper. I highly recommend this one simply because it has the dropper. Especially recommend if you’re going to use it on a piercing or a small area of your skin for more precise application. It healed my piercing and dried out the small blister/pimple/pre-keloid to the point when I can sleep on my side and change out my ring. Definitely going to repurchase when I run out, this stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.author: E. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff Here
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product five Stars despite the smell. I understand that almost all Tea Tree oil have a very strong scent. You really can’t get any with a scent that is perfect. I purchased it to clear up a breakout and in less than 3 days it was gone. I also use it on razor bumps and it works every time. Call me a bit crazy, but I can almost swear that I can see changes and feel relief in just hours after I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This product is up to par with other tea tree oils I have used. I use this as an acne spot treatment, and add it to castor oil to help with hair growth. I have seen improvement in both of these areas since using tea tree oil. Do be advised, the picture of the bottle in the posting is misleading; it comes in a 2oz bottle, which is smaller than the pic. However, this is still a great value for a 2oz bottle of good quality tea tree oil, so I do recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Britt K

customer_reviews.title: No longer comes with a dropper :(
customer_reviews.text: I liked to buy this brand because of its great value & it had A DROPPER. I would have given this 5 star’s ⭐️ but I just opened my new one today and unfortunately there is now “no dropper”. Very disappointed because that makes things SO MUCH easier. I will have to search for a new brand moving forward that offers a new dropper with each purchase or at least an option.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Quality Essential Oil for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand some of the poor ratings for this... it smells and feels EXACTLY like Young Living brand of Tea Tree Oil and they give you a half ounce more for less money... It has worked to help me get over some pesky jock itch and it’s a great buy... Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Luke W

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging. No strong order. Comes with a dropper.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a box with a seal around the bottle top to prevent leakage. In a previous order, the bottle leaked out a lot of the contents so I am glad the company took measures to prevent future packages from leaking. As for the oil itself, I prefer this brand's 100% pure tea tree oil because the scent is not strong. I also like that it comes with the dropper. Great product. I will definitely order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Key

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a childproof lid which is difficult for my arthritic hand. I just find it annoying. I am using this to try to cure a little toenail fungus...not enough trial time to speak about its effectiveness in that regard. I'm not so fond of the scent that i would use it for pain relief but my toes are far away enough from my nose. I'm neutral on the pain relief aspect as that is not what i'm using this product for.That's why only rated it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mizpractical

customer_reviews.title: Powerful healing properties
customer_reviews.text: This is a small bottle but very powerful! Healed my dry/itchy scalp after one use. I’m an extremely picky person, so I hate the smell 100%, but I will deal with it because it works so well! This bottle should last me at least 3months
customer_reviews.author: CHELLY

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to use in a topical flea lotion for my dog : )  It  works too!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't aware of using tea tree oil for pain - now that I am, I will try it. QUESTION: what is the suggested mixture strength? Anybody? I will mix it with Coconut Oil - simple mixture and will give it a try until I read a suggestion - thank you : ) Oh, I would prefer a glass bottle - but otherwise, pleased!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Seems watered down to me.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I am use to. The smell was different and it seemed to be watered down. I would recommend not trying this product as I was disappointed. I did not get it for pain but I did get it to go in my shampoo and conditioner to try to help with dandruff but like I said it was way different from others I have gotten.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Works great for keloids!
customer_reviews.text: I had this before I had my keloid (nose ring bump), and used it for scent diffuser and for my face to prevent acne. There's a lot of product and you only need a few drops for each use so it lasts a really long time. Great value for the price. This is my second bottle from them. I had no issues. Only downside is the childproof top. It's kind of annoying to get off, but good for spills I guess. Remember to dilute it for topical applications. This is strong stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, in fact I bought another one. It comes with a dropper and a normal cap. The dropper is a little hard to get off sometimes but works very nice. I used it on my son with iodine to cure a rash. It has a slight but not overpowering scent.
customer_reviews.author: cinteza

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Bottle!!!
customer_reviews.text: This could be an awesome product, but do we really need more plastic in the world? I love Tea Tree Oil, and during this "Shelter in Place" the easiest way to replace my dwindling supply was to order from Amazon; I ordered 2 of my regulars and thought I'd try this one since is was a little cheaper. I don't even know how the quality is, I was just so bummed to see it was in a PLASTIC bottle. I'll stick with my regular tee tree oil in the glass bottles in the future.
customer_reviews.author: YorkNY

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I ordered and at a great price. I used it on my skin and can feel the refreshing sensation right away. The 100% tea tree oil got here quick and the secure packaging to the bottle making sure it got to me with no damage or leaking. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: evon

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Whatever caused my dandruff and itchy scalp not sure, but this teatreee oil was recommended and it solved my problem after a few days. No more dry itchy hair no more flakes. Please use with a carrier oil. It may be too strong to use directly on the skin or scalp. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Our living room once was bothered by ants, but my husband didn’t like the smell of repellent. So I bought this oil and drop it on the cotton balls, put them by the side of the door. It works! Yesterday my husband forgot to throw the trash, and this morning I found it in the garage with disgusting smell. I quickly threw the trash and dropped this oil. When I came back 15 minuets later, There was barely any smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Cai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for toenail fungus!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the negative reviews and claims of fake. I have a toenail fungus that I have tried all anti-fungals on for a year and hasn't made a dent. I researched and found tea tree oil can help, after 3 months of using this oil on my toenail, massive improvement, so if it was fake or watered down it would likely not have helped. So I am happy with this product. It's a BIG bottle so you will have more oil than you will know what to do with, and a great low price.
customer_reviews.author: Nucky

customer_reviews.title: This is not tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this is, but it smells like turpentine and the fumes burns my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: STINKS! STINKS! STINKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this for a nail fungus that developed after a long course of antibiotics. I totally couldn’t tolerate the smell! Anything I ate tasted like it, and I couldn’t bear to have my hands anywhere near my pillow when I was sleeping. I’m now using NFT20. It has no scent and seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: JRAZ

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of the scent. I do know tea tree oil but this came off as harsh and gave me a headache. Super strong if you’re into that. I couldn’t use it after the first couple of uses, I tried to give it a chance and change the amount but couldn’t find a happy balance that didn’t give me an instant headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothe that hair weave head tap itch!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly 100% Pure bottle of tea tree oil and the scent is strong. Do not apply just the oil to scalp, do get a separate bottle and add at least 1/3 to 1/2 of olive oil, coconut oil, etc. It says this in small print on the bottle and in an article I read. In a day, that itch is gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy P.

customer_reviews.title: Not tea tree oil & plastic bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using tea tree oil for years and it has a very distinct smell. When I opened my last package it smells nothing like tea tree and came in a plastic bottle, which only diluted oils can safely be stored in. I’ve purchased in the past from the same source and the product was in glass and legitimate- this seems like a cheap hack and honestly could be dangerously some other substance or contaminated by the plastic bottle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for human ear pain as well as my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: I don’t waste my money on doctors if I can help it. There are so many home remedies that really work and this is one of them . I mix a few drops in 3 tsp of coconut oil and shake it use a dropper to put a few drops in and in a few minutes the pain is gone and I do the same with my dog when he has itchy ears it works every time
customer_reviews.author: bobbie z.

customer_reviews.title: Worth your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product ordered this product to control my son's dandruff even with clinical shampoos still ended up with dandruff an a dry red flaky sore forhead. This tea tree oil works not watered down or anything . Yes this product has a medicine smell but I learned to use on his hair at night so when he goes to work its not a strong smell. Every time he gets an itch he applies a small amount on the itch at night an he is good to go . Will deffinatly buy this product again an a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarmama

customer_reviews.title: Manage Pimples/ Breakouts the Natural Way
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great product to get rid of skin tags and acne. Face is super sensitive. Used Del Sure Naturals 100% Fractionated Coconut Oil as a carrier. Use Q-tip to apply at breakout areas. If you feel a pimple coming on, use cotton ball, apply to surrounding areas immediately for preventative measure or to minimize breakout.
customer_reviews.author: sifr

customer_reviews.title: Pure essential oil
customer_reviews.text: This is pure essential oil. To the woman who "burnt the hell out of her skin"...read the bottle....it explicitly says not to put it on your skin unless you carefully dilute it with a carrier oil. This is very good oil. Long lasting scent. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Because I have not used the oil yet, I cannot rate its effectiveness with relieving pain yet. I can say that I never had tea tree oil alone before, but I had read prior reviews, so I didnt really know what to expect. It does have a rather strong odor, that I can't describe, but it has been advised that I mix it with another oil, e.g. peppermint or the like, which will give me the pain relief, while minimizing the strong odor. I do feel that the price was fair and that I got the value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear93

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree Oil Helps Pets for Tic Relief
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Tea Tree oil for follow up care for our dogs. Tics seem drawn to them when they go on neighborhood walks. My husband gets the tics off, but there is always a danger of infection and pain. Tea tree oil applied to the affected sites results in faster healing and no infection. We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tchr67

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I made some liquid soap with other stuff at my Temporary home fir person's with mental illness whose lifestyles are challenged meaning they live like criminals prostitute instead of utilizing the social welfare programs in AMERICA..ITS MY OBJECTIVE TO STAY ALIVE AND WELL..IN DALLAS, TEXAS AT THE Answer Homeless Community Services Program and Unlicensed Board N Care.. 1506 East Illinois Avenue; Dallas, TX 75216..USA
customer_reviews.author: nemasa

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after watching a YT video review of its effectiveness on hyperpigmentation when used with a toner. I purchased both products and finished both with happy results. I use essential oils for different things and found this oil worked great on acne and hyperpigmented areas. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: V.Nikol

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great price
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this Tea Tree Oil works fantastically on my itchy scalp, it has helped tremendously. The price is fantastic for the large bottle. But....the smell is absolutely horrid!! I can't even describe the smell. It is almost like burnt motor oil or something. That is my only complaint with the product. It the smell was better it would be a 5-star review!
customer_reviews.author: nmillwood00

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4oz bottle to get the maximum value for the price and boy I wasn't disappointed. It perfect undiluted and natural, I use it with Carrier oil (coconut ) on my face to reduce break out, and i can feel the potency of the oil. I love it. Definitely order more later.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: its VERY GOOD. it works for a numerous amount of fungus ...
customer_reviews.text: had to come back and fix it... its VERY GOOD. it works for a numerous amount of fungus from head to toe with you mix it with shampoo, soap, etc... and even rashes... super strong but good
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Intense and effective!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and (sometimes) I use tea tree oil to reduce "bags" under our eyes. My wife reports that it is a bit stronger than what she had been using. It irritates her eyes a little. But--it works better, she looks better, and what's a little eye irritation anyway? We are very happy with Artizen Tea Tree Essential Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Horny Trumpeter

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not sealed properly.
customer_reviews.text: The oil is exceptional. I rated it at three stars because the bottle wasn't properly sealed and leaked in the box it was shipped in. I lost around 1/4 of the oil. I don't have time to return it for another. Heading out on the camping trip for which the oil was purchased. Update. Company sent another bottle free of charge. Now that's customer service, not that it was free but they read my review and made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Case

customer_reviews.title: The wonder drug
customer_reviews.text: While tea tree oil is known to heal cuts and grazes quickly, help zits disappear and be an antifungal, we bought this because my daughter was in contact with kids who had lice. I told my wife years ago that a drop behind each ear will keep them from invading our kids it was only when she paid someone to inspect my daughter's hair and they told her the same thing that she got this.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It has an additive color to it. The odor ...
customer_reviews.text: It has an additive color to it. The odor is a bit different than other pure tea tree oil I've purchased. That might just be the result of the color additive, but at any rate, it's not quite what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Nenana Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I use many of the oils daily for my pedicure business. Clients love the aromatherapy. But I have to say I hate the new packaging. The oils used to come in very nice colored apothecary bottles with droppers, but now the packaging is cheap plastic bottles with no dropper. It's a pain in the tush to fumble with them and it's very messy. That is why I gave them 3 stars. Other than that, the oils are great. I however found the cinnamon oil is irritating to skin, so is best used in a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Coe

customer_reviews.title: Still works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought tee tree oil from a different company through amazon which I loved. I thought I chose from the same company but I dont think I did. This small bottle costs more than the large bottle I had last time and I dont believe the potency is the same level. I guess I am used to using something a bit stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Pembleton

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I work as a dog handler and my K9 scratched my arm after he's been in the kennels and it flared up into a huge infection and began to spread all over my arm. Iwent to a minute clinic and got ointment and medication prescribed to me but barely helped. I got this and applied it to the infected areas and boom! It went away! I now use tea tree for everything!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Homemade disinfectant
customer_reviews.text: Great scent. Used for a DIY homemade disinfectant spray. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: SJL-Instructor

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent, but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make homemade hand sanitizer. the scent is really strong, but it doesn't linger. I also used it on my fingers that have arthritis after I heard it could help. Not sure if it did or not, but the massage felt good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It passed paper testing! Pure essential oils without mix of Carrier oils.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Remove mold
customer_reviews.text: Used it to removed mold on wall in garage Mix 2 teaspoon with 2 cup of water in a spray bottle. Sprayed on wall after a few seconds wiped off with towel. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: R. DelGrosso

customer_reviews.title: received earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it came earlier than expected. I did think I had ordered a bigger bottle but that's my fault I should've have checked to see how many oz's the product was. last but not least the packaging was good but for some reason there was still a little bit of leaking im not sure where it came from I think the cap must have not been shut tight. other than that the product itself gets a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Iris alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Very effective oil , but dropper is something else...
customer_reviews.text: This would have been fine with the dropper, but the dropper came in 3 separate pieces and I couldn't get the benefit of use since I couldn't assemble the dropper! Otherwise oil is wonderful to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aly in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: tree tea oil
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product for about 2 days so of course I see no difference. I am using this for mild toenail fungus. I will continue to use it to see if it works. I like the way it smells.it needs to be mixed with a carrier oil of some type otherwise it burns your skin I read. I mix mine with 1 tbsp. of water [also read that ]
customer_reviews.author: melissa pelham

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. I put it on dental pics and clean between my teeth instead of flossing. Works like magic, kills all the germs in my mouth and leaves it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: kaarina718

customer_reviews.title: I have been a believer in melaleuca for years!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I have used tea tree oil for a variety of uses for eons! I was glad to find some at a great price I hae already used this bottle in several batches of my products and still have pretty much a full bottle! A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: SoSheik

customer_reviews.title: product leaked
customer_reviews.text: thankfully i ordered this alone because the product leaked all over the box. tea tree oil is very potent so be careful ordering this with other packages! for the most part it's fine, i didn't lose a ton of product at least but be warned it has a high leaking potential and can ruin things you order with it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was really excited. But when I opened it, the dropper piece was broken so I had no way of getting 2-3 drops out without dumping the whole bottle. They refunded my money and sent a new bottle free of charge. I’ve been using this for only a few days, mixing it with my lotion and my skin is clearing up and getting so much softer! I had one stubborn zit that was super deep and would go away but has started to since I began this! Great customer service and product! I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. DO NOT USE IT IF IT COMES IN A PLASTIC BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle came with almost no oil left in the bottle. I request to return it, the second came in a plastic bottle. I don't understand why essential oil is in a plastic bottle. Update: Just started to use this essential oil and it smells like tea tree mixed with something else. I should have returned it instead of asking for a replacement. DO NOT USE IT IF IT COMES IN A PLASTIC BOTTLE
customer_reviews.author: lovaurl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Tea tree oil smell is specific if you’re not familiar with it but not unpleasant and this oil has it’s purpose so ...
customer_reviews.author: alexphoenix

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy and a great value
customer_reviews.text: The size to price ratio is fantastic, and the dropper makes it easy to apply. I mix this with my moisturizer and as a treatment for dandruff, which, with combing, has worked very well! The dropper allows me to target specific areas of my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Pungent, clean scent
customer_reviews.text: I don't use essential oils for any kind of clinical therapy, but do enjoy using this essential oil for its aroma in my home. I first tried the Lavender essential oil from Artizen, and decided to try this Tea Tree oil as a 2nd attempt based on my previous success with the Lavender essential oil. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: i'M GLAD I DISCOVERED THIS
customer_reviews.text: Other than the smell, which I don't like, I think this is a great product. I got it to see if I could get rid of skin tags on my neck that have been bothering me. It seems to be working. They are not gone yet, but they are definitely smaller so i am anticipating that they will fall off eventually, as they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: penguingirl

customer_reviews.title: Not for hair
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended to me as oil that I could apply to my hair but I don't like it. The smell is intolerable. It maybe because I don't know what to expect and it is my first time using tea oil
customer_reviews.author: Lilian Lawoyin

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Using oil on toe. Eye dropper application is so much easier than first bottle we bought without it. Haven’t used oil very long, but it really seems to be working. Good product, quick delivery and as advertised. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Heals everything for me!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course it does not smell good! But I swear by it. It heals everything in NO TIME, EVEN a painful little pimple on the tip of the tongue. I like the dropper; it makes it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole PAVILES

customer_reviews.title: Works as I thought it would!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my baby’s cradle cap & a ringworm my husband had. The smell is very strong. I stored it in my cabinet and my entire cabinet smells like this. I used coconut oil as a base for my baby because i wasn’t sure if I could put the tea tree oil directly on his head. Both issues went away within the first three uses. I’m now thinking about using it for my acne!
customer_reviews.author: Lorry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product with great customer service. Very impressed with the quality, quick delivery and overall experience. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Prasenjit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, a little goes a long way. I use this in argan (carrier oil) to treat acne and blemishes. The scent is strong, but it doesn't have an overly ammonia scent like other tea tree oils. It absorbs quickly and feels very light. Also good for natural insect repellent and astringent.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I've used tea tree oil in the past for other things but when I ran out I didn't replace it. I had a random acne breakout and a friend suggested tea tree oil. The breakout that was there for almost a week was almost gone overnight. Definitely repurchasing this once it's finished.
customer_reviews.author: Francheska Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Dropper Was Not Included.
customer_reviews.text: I been using this brand for 3 years and it always come with a dropper. This was the fourth time that the dropper was not included. I bought a lavender and lemon 2oz and Eucalyptus 1oz in April and recently a tea tree 2oz. Please send me the droppers. It’s hard to use the oils without the droppers.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars - wish I had read the reviews! RANCID and not a full bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The rating on here HAS to be fake. Mine came only partially full (though the seal was not broken, a good 25% empty), and smells absolutely rancid! Just horrible, and totally unusable. DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: jessicad

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this very same product. My first order was great, however, this last one was not the same. It was watered down and not the same quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OliPartyOf7

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tea tree oil. Make sure you dilute it with another carrier oil. I used it by itself on my face and the smell was almost enough to choke a horse. But other than that I have no complaints. I mixed mine with Jamaican black castor oil to use on my hair and skin.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to go in my kids shampoo to prevent head love from school. The smell is pretty bad, but it’s a lot for the price and came very quickly. I’m guessing the scent is what keeps the bugs away 🤣. You can’t smell it once it’s mixed in with the shampoo so that’s a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Walker

customer_reviews.title: Smells like motor oil
customer_reviews.text: I’m just trying this out for my puppy who somehow got scabies. I couldn’t stand seeing her miserable between treatments so I figured I try home remedies. This stuff smells like motor oil, so when I put it on my dog I felt worse. I feel like I made her sick just by having it on her with the smell so strong. I can’t say if it did anything beneficial though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff. I suffer from serious allergies so I mix this with another oil which soothes my itchy skin while protecting it. It was packaged perfectly and even came with its own dropper. Will definitely order again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size bottle. These should all be 1 ounce but the tea tree is significantly smaller than the others and the bottle is not glass, like the others. It’s also not full.
customer_reviews.author: Kirah B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong potent smell so it must be real. I’ve made ointments with it that work had it long enough to say from my one purchase it’s real good stuff and strong thanks for a great product and fair price
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo Gorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Not pure
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Tea Tree oil before, but this one is very light in scent and not as strong as pure/ natural Tea tree oil. Which leads me to be believe this is not 100% pure tea tree oil like it says. I’ve only been using it for 2 days, but let’s see if the antibacterial benefits of Oil works!
customer_reviews.author: nicole sriskanda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality, I thought I would go for the cheapest option, it doesn't seem very strong, and definitely not as aromatic as some other brands I've bought like Nature's Truth brand.
customer_reviews.author: Toya J.

customer_reviews.title: like turpentine. I'm kinda worried about putting this in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely NOT 100% tea tree oil, It has a weird chemical smell to it, like turpentine. I'm kinda worried about putting this in any of my skincare stuff because it's gotta have some extra, unlisted ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Wat

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to add in a gift basket I was making for my dad. He was satisfied with the quality and uses it for all sorts of things.
customer_reviews.author: Fati

customer_reviews.title: This arrived leaking
customer_reviews.text: Arrived leaking through the screwed on lid (no seal on the bottle!), so ruined the bug zapper box that I was giving to friend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sweet so perfect
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this in our diffuser. The svent is so pleasant and we like to use it with the good sleep and calming . Amazing combination
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Hart

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: It arrived encased in bubble wrap which is always fun for me to pop. I've tried dozens of different tea tree oils and I feel this one is the best as you can administer the oil with the dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Must have this product saves me thousands in medical bills!
customer_reviews.text: Great I use as antiseptic bug bites. Any infections on out side of body . Mix with baking soda and water for great mouthwash
customer_reviews.author: Jedward

product_meta.title: Artizen Tea Tree Essential Oil (100% PURE & NATURAL - UNDILUTED) Therapeutic Grade - Huge 1oz Bottle - Perfect for Aromatherapy, Relaxation, Skin Therapy & More!
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Tea Tree| Size:1 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)100% Pure Tea Tree Essential Oil by Artizen
feature_bullets: GUARANTEED HIGHEST QUALITY, MOST POTENT TEA TREE OIL - What sets Artizen Essential Oils apart are their unparalleled purity and concentration. Natural, with no adulterants or dilution, their oils provide the maximum benefit possible and are uncompromising.

DON'T FALL VICTIM TO CHEAP DILUTED TEA TREE OIL - Most of the Competition Dilute Their Oil with a Cheap Carrier Oil or Even Other Potentially Dangerous Chemicals. Our Tea Tree Oil is Routinely Tested for Purity And Other Unique Qualities in Order to Ensure You Are Buying The Purest Oil Available

MOST 4 OUNCE TEA TREE OILS CONTAIN LESS THAN 1/3 OF NATURAL OIL - Unfortunately, there's a lot of misrepresentation of the term 100% Oil, However it's usually only 1/3 of the Natural Oil and 2/3 Carrier Oil.
HIGH QUALITY BOTTLES - We use high quality bottles infused with a uv colored coating to protect essential oils against sunlight and degradation.

LIFETIME WARRANTY AND GUARANTEE - The manufacturer, Artizen Essential Oils, offers a lifetime warranty and guarantee on their product. If you are ever unsatisfied for any reason they will replace your product or refund your money. And they stand behind and guarantee the purity of their oils.
